account.login.azure: You have successfully logged into Azure.
account.login.m365: You have successfully logged into Microsoft 365.
account.show.azure: Your Azure account is: %s. Your subscriptions are: %s
error.MissingRequiredOptionError: The command '%s' can not be executed for missing required option '%s'. Provide the option via '%s' and try again.
error.MissingRequiredArgumentError: The command '%s' can not be executed for missing required argument '%s'. Provide the argument and try again.
error.ArgumentConflictError: The command '%s' is designed to accept either argument '%s' or argument '%s', but not both simultaneously. Keep either of the two arguments and try again.
error.UnknownOptionError: The command '%s' can not be executed for unknown option '%s'.
error.InvalidOptionErrorReason: '%s' is not in the valid option list: %s.
error.InvalidChoiceError: The command '%s' can not be executed for invalid choice '%s' for option/argument '%s', allowed values: %s.

options.force: Force upgrade the project to work with the latest version of Teams Toolkit.
